description: Any cash transaction or series of related cash transactions that exceeds USD 10,000 in a single business day MUST be reported to FinCEN within 15 calendar days.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 10000 AND Payment_Format = 'Cash'

description: All wire transfers where the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 50,000 in a single transaction must be flagged for enhanced due diligence.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 50000 AND Payment_Format = 'Wire'

description: Any transaction classified as Payment_Format = 'Reinvestment' where the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 25,000 must be escalated to the compliance officer for manual review within 48 hours.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 25000 AND Payment_Format = 'Reinvestment'

description: Any transaction involving conversion to or from a digital asset where the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 3,000 must be logged and the counterparty wallet address recorded for VASP compliance.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 3000 AND Payment_Format = 'Crypto'

description: Any transaction where the Payment_Currency differs from the Receiving_Currency and the Amount_Paid exceeds USD 5,000 must be logged as a potential layering event.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Payment_Currency != Receiving_Currency AND Amount_Paid > 5000

description: Transfers originating from or destined to banks in high-risk jurisdictions where the amount exceeds USD 1,000 must be automatically flagged pending review.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 1000 AND apply jurisdiction filter at runtime

description: Accounts with no transactions for 90 or more days that suddenly initiate a transaction exceeding USD 5,000 must be flagged for review.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 5000 AND dormancy check requires temporal analysis

description: Accounts where the total transaction volume in any 7-day rolling window exceeds 300% of the account's 90-day average daily volume must be escalated for behavioural review.
Any cheque-based payment exceeding USD 15,000 must be verified against the account holder identity.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 15000 AND Payment_Format = 'Cheque'

description: ACH transfers from a single account totalling more than USD 100,000 within a 7-day period constitute a high-risk aggregation pattern.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Payment_Format = 'ACH' AND Amount_Paid > 10000

description: Real-time payment network transactions (e.g. RTP, FedNow) exceeding USD 20,000 in a single transfer or USD 75,000 cumulatively in any 24-hour period must be flagged for same-day review.
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Amount_Paid > 20000 AND Payment_Format = 'RTP' OR Cumulative_RTP_24h > 75000

description: Confirmed laundering transactions where Amount_Paid exceeds USD 50,000 require immediate escalation to the Financial Intelligence Unit (FIU).
sql_hint: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE Is_Laundering = 1 AND Amount_Paid > 50000
